# Government Tender Notice

## Invitation to Bid - Cleaning and Disinfecting Services

The following invitation to bid pertains to a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the supply of labour, materials, and equipment for on-site services in support of the Inspection, Cleaning, and Decontamination Program (ICDP).

### Bid Information

*   **Bid Title:** Invitation to Bid for Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for Cleaning and Disinfecting Services
*   **Bid Reference:** WS3712735374-Doc3802183891
*   **Amendment Number:** 0
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 1 February 2023 at 14:00 EST
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** 1 March 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** 31 December 2024

### Description of Services

The successful bidder will be required to provide on-site services for the ICDP, which will be used on an “as-and-when-required” basis as detailed in the Statement of Work, Annex 'A'. The scope of work includes providing all necessary labour, materials, and equipment for the services.

### Eligibility

This bid solicitation is open to all qualified suppliers who can meet the requirements outlined in the bid documents.

### Evaluation and Award Process

The lowest-priced bid will be the most responsive, and the contract will be awarded to the successful bidder. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who submit a bid.
